priyantha ha sampath,tharanganige upandina uthsawayata yamata pera nangige suwada wilawun bothalayen tikak illa ganima, tharanganige patiyata athulwana wita, madhyama panthikayanta,dhanapathiyange wasasthanaya thula athiwana sabakolaya, elesama priyantha, tharangani gana maha merak tharamata sitha sitiyada ,ema sambhashanayedi mula sitama priyanthata dakwana adu salakillath,ehidi priyanthawa tharangani wisin sigarat gena eema sadaha kade arinne,methana sitina wadagath ayata kiya ese kirimata bari bawada kiyamini.
